SELECT B.agt_cd || A.seq AS erpDeptCd FROM ( SELECT Substr(To_char(To_number('1' || Nvl(Max(Substr(I.erp_dept_cd, 6, 5)), '00000') + 1)), 2, 5) AS SEQ FROM agt_dum_dept I WHERE I.erp_dept_cd LIKE #{agtCd} || '%' ) A cross join agt_agent B WHERE B.agt_cd = #{agtCd}
INSERT INTO agt_dum_dept ( erp_dept_cd, dept_nm, dept_tel, reg_dt, e4u_if_dt, e4u_dept_cd ) VALUES ( #{erpDeptCd}, #{deptNm}, #{deptTel}, To_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), NULL, NULL )
mapper.select: SELECT A.erp_dept_cd, A.dept_nm, dept_tel, To_date(A.reg_dt, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS REG_DT, To_date(A.e4u_if_dt, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS E4U_IF_DT, A.e4u_dept_cd FROM agt_dum_dept A WHERE A.erp_dept_cd = #{erpDeptCd}

SELECT A.erp_dept_cd, A.dept_nm, dept_tel, To_date(A.reg_dt, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS REG_DT, To_date(A.e4u_if_dt, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS E4U_IF_DT, A.e4u_dept_cd FROM agt_dum_dept A WHERE A.dept_nm = #{deptNm} AND A.erp_dept_cd LIKE #{agtCd} || '%'
SELECT A.erp_dept_cd, A.dept_nm, dept_tel, To_date(A.reg_dt, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS REG_DT, A.e4u_if_dt, A.e4u_dept_cd FROM agt_dum_dept A WHERE A.e4u_dept_cd IS NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE agt_dum_dept SET e4u_dept_cd = #{e4uDeptCd}, e4u_if_dt = To_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') WHERE erp_dept_cd = #{erpDeptCd}
